isis.stitle: TSI 08-12-03 - Revise Special Torques On Power Steering Flared Tube Nuts

subjectgroup.subject: Revise Special Torques On Power Steering Flared Tube Nuts

geninfo.para: An error in the special torque values for the power steering flared tube nuts has been found in the EGES 345 Engine Service Manual.
Refer to the Air Compressor and Power Steering Pump section, page 123, Table 10 and Appendix B - Torques page 372, Table 50. Make the following changes to the special torque tables.

verbatim.line: Suction power steering tube flared tube nut
Pressure power steering tube flared tube nut
